title: F.B.I. Shines a Bright Light on Dissent
keywords: war on terror war on terrorism homeland defense homeland security monitoring of political dissent monitoring of dissent interrogate interrogation infiltration of opposition intimidation intimidate freedom of speech first amendment amendments civil liberty civil liberties bill of rights constitution freedom of expression protest protests protesting dissenting dissent
caption: FBI.  Dissent.  (A light, typical of those used during interrogations, shines on a woman carrying a "Dissent" sign.)
